channel.title: Blog on code(evening);

item.title: 깃허브(GitHub) + 휴고(Hugo), 블로그 효과적으로 관리하기
item.description: In the previous part, we looked at how to create a blog and apply a theme using Hugo. In this part, I summarized the results of thinking about how to efficiently manage source code with a function called Submodule, assuming that GitHub is being used. Source code structure built with Hugo ¶ If you had previously built your blog with Hugo, the directory structure below would have been created. Rather than explaining everything, let’s look at a few necessary folders.
